sentence: The contest for governor will feature the Democratic Attorney General Ben Shapiro and GOP State Sen. Doug Mastriano, another Republican endorsed by Trump.
author: Brad Bannon
title: Party primaries test power of Trumps backing and progressive platform

sentence: It helped Pennsylvanias Doug Mastriano claim a double-digit victory in his Republican gubernatorial race.
author: Eric Lutz
title: Donald Trumps Georgia Revenge Fantasy Isnt Quite Panning Out

sentence: Republicans have already elevated candidates like State Senator Doug Mastriano, a far-right 2020 election denier who is the Republican nominee for governor in Pennsylvania.
title: Democrats Fight Headwinds in Georgia and Beyond: The Problem Is Reality
